# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Returns a substring of the attributed string using a range to indicate the substring bounds.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript<R>(bounds: R) -> AttributedSubstring where R : RangeExpression, R.Bound == AttributedString.Index { get }
```
title: subscript(_:)
